spatial_accuracy.notes: 3D layout does not match the 2D plan’s single open-plan Kitchen/Dining/Living arrangement. 3D shows multiple enclosed rooms (bedroom-like spaces) instead of the large open right-side Living/Dining and top-left Kitchen. Central bathroom location/shape and access do not match. Stair core on left side from 2D is not present. Exterior window/door positions do not correspond to the 2D perimeter openings, and overall room proportions are fundamentally different.

structural_fidelity.notes: Major structural deviations: missing stair block entirely, added/hallucinated partition walls creating extra rooms, and incorrect adjacency relationships (2D has open Kitchen-Dining-Living connectivity; 3D partitions them into separate rooms). Entrance location and interior door network do not match the plan. Multiple hallucinated spaces appear that are not on the 2D plan.

furniture_mapping.notes: Furniture is not mapped to the 2D program: 3D includes beds and bedroom furniture not indicated on the plan, and does not clearly represent the kitchen fixtures (counters/appliances) shown in 2D. Scales appear plausible internally, but they correspond to a different layout than the plan.

aesthetic_quality.notes: Render is visually clean with coherent materials, lighting, and a consistent isometric-style camera. However, it is slightly perspective rather than strict orthographic/isometric, and some elements (walls/openings) read simplified. Overall clarity is good despite plan mismatch.

detected_errors.description: Missing staircase block on the left side that is clearly present in the 2D plan.
Kitchen area placement/program does not match: 2D shows kitchen at top-left with counters/appliances; 3D does not depict this configuration in that location.
Dining/Living open-plan on the right side (2D) is instead divided into multiple smaller rooms in 3D.
Bathroom position/shape and its door access do not match the central small bathroom shown in the 2D plan.
Main entrance at bottom-center in the 2D plan is not clearly present/placed correctly in the 3D model.
Exterior window placements do not correspond to the 2D plan’s perimeter openings (top wall, bottom wall, and right wall window locations differ).
Interior door orientations/swing logic are inconsistent with the 2D plan due to different wall/room arrangement.
Overall proportions are distorted: the 2D plan indicates a large continuous right-side Living/Dining zone; 3D compresses/reshapes this into smaller compartments.
Hallucinated rooms: 3D includes bedroom-like rooms (beds, wardrobes) not shown anywhere on the 2D floor plan.
Hallucinated interior partitions/walls that are not present in the 2D plan, fundamentally changing circulation and adjacency.
